snippet: The first phase of jury selection in the trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev in the Boston Marathon bombing ended Wednesday.
abstract: First phase of jury selection ends in trial of suspected Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev; more than 1,350 prospective jurors fill out questionnaires.
lead_paragraph: The first phase of jury selection in the trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev in the Boston Marathon bombing ended Wednesday.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Prospective Jurors Screened for Trial of Dzhokhar Tsarnaev
